questions.question: How frequently do you evaluate new technology for your business?

options.text: Continuously as part of business strategy.

questions.question: How are your business processes currently documented?
How would you describe your business data management?
How do you typically respond to new technology?
How much time do repetitive, manual tasks consume in your business?

options.text: A significant portion of our time.

questions.question: What is your approach to technology investments?
How do you currently measure business performance?
What is your timeline for exploring AI implementations?
How would you describe your business's competitive landscape regarding technology?

options.text: Some competitors have started. Moderate pressure.
Many competitors using tech. High pressure.

questions.question: What resources could you allocate to AI implementation and training?

options.text: Dedicated budget and staff time already.

beginner.title: AI Explorer
beginner.description: Your business is in the early stages of AI readiness. While you've taken the first step by considering AI, you have significant opportunities to build foundations that will support successful implementation. Currently, your processes, data systems, or readiness would likely create barriers to effective AI adoption.
action_points: Start documenting key business processes that consume the most time
Begin centralizing and organizing your business data
Invest in basic AI awareness training for your team
Book a PhaseOne AI consultation to identify quick wins
Develop a 12-month technology roadmap with expert guidance

intermediate.title: AI Adapter
intermediate.description: Your business has established some essential foundations for AI adoption. You have moderate readiness in key areas but need targeted improvements before fully leveraging AI. With strategic guidance, you could quickly advance to higher-level implementations that deliver significant value.
action_points: Complete documentation of any remaining critical processes
Enhance data quality and accessibility where gaps exist
Identify 2-3 specific AI use cases for immediate piloting
Schedule a PhaseOne AI workshop to develop an implementation strategy
Allocate resources for a test implementation within 3-6 months

advanced.title: AI Innovator
advanced.description: Your business demonstrates strong AI readiness fundamentals. You've established the necessary foundations across process documentation, data management, team capabilities, and strategic alignment. You're well-positioned to implement AI solutions that could transform your business operations.
action_points: Book a PhaseOne AI strategic session to prioritize high-value AI applications.
Begin vendor selection for your first implementation
Develop advanced measurement frameworks to track AI ROI
Create a change management plan for smooth integration
Explore industry-specific AI innovations with expert guidance
